metadata.title: CVE-2017-16910 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: An error within the "LibRaw::xtrans_interpolate()" function (internal/dcraw_common.cpp) in LibRaw versions prior to 0.18.6 can be exploited to cause an invalid read memory access and subsequently a Denial of Service condition.

criterions.comment: darktable package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
dcraw package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
exactimage package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
libraw package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.18.8-1').
rawtherapee package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
